name: Cowboys And Indians Online Trivia | U.S. History | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who was the Indian war leader in the Sioux War of 1876-1877?
questions.explanation:
Crazy Horse.

	Played by J. Carroll Naish in the 1950 movie 'Annie Get Your Gun' and the 1954 movie 'Sitting Bull'.Sitting Bull was the tribal chief and Crazy Horse was the war leader.

questions.text: What was the name of Sitting Bull's father?
What cowboy singer was the leader of the 'Smokey Mountain Boys'?
Who played Hopalong Cassidy in the movies?
questions.explanation:
William Boyd.

	Gene Barry was Bat Masterson, Clayton Moore was the Lone Ranger and Dale Robertson was in 'Tales of Wells Fargo'.

questions.text: What was the name of the horse ridden by Tom Mix?
questions.explanation:
Tony.

	Scout-Tonto, Champion-Gene Autry, Trigger-Roy Rogers.

questions.text: Who played Hoss on 'Bonanza' on T.V.?
questions.explanation:
Dan Blocker.

	Lorne Green-Ben Cartwright, Michael Landon-Joe and Pernell Roberts-Adam.

questions.text: Geronimo was an Indian chief of what tribe?
Which of the following was not a leader of a country and western band?
questions.explanation:
Hank Snow.

	Ernest Tubb-Texas Troubadours, Eddy Arnold-Tennessee Plowboys, Porter Wagner-Wagonmasters.

questions.text: Who played Matt Dillon on the radio series 'Gunsmoke'?
questions.explanation:
William Conrad.

	James Arness played him on TV.
